Command.Statement: WITH MEMBER [Measures].[XL_SD0] AS 'strtomember("[Measures].[Sales Amount]").UniqueName' MEMBER [Measures].[XL_SD1] AS 'strtomember("[Measures].[Sales Amount]").properties("caption")' MEMBER [Measures].[XL_SD2] AS '{strtomember("[Measures].[Sales Amount]")}.item(0).item(0).level.UniqueName' MEMBER [Measures].[XL_SD3] AS 'strtomember("[Measures].[Tax Amt]").UniqueName' MEMBER [Measures].[XL_SD4] AS 'strtomember("[Measures].[Tax Amt]").properties("caption")' MEMBER [Measures].[XL_SD5] AS '{strtomember("[Measures].[Tax Amt]")}.item(0).item(0).level.UniqueName' SELECT {[Measures].[XL_SD0],[Measures].[XL_SD1],[Measures].[XL_SD2],[Measures].[XL_SD3],[Measures].[XL_SD4],[Measures].[XL_SD5]} ON 0 FROM [AS Adventure Micro] CELL PROPERTIES VALUE
